meanings.definition: The act of not having enough staff to adequately perform tasks.
meanings.sent1: The understaffings in the restaurant led to long wait times for customers.
meanings.sent2: The company's understaffings caused delays in project completion.
meanings.sent3: The understaffings at the zoo made the monkeys try to help out!
meanings.sent4: The understaffings in the hospital turned the emergency room into a chaotic scene.
meanings.sent5: The understaffings during the holiday season made shopping a nightmare.

meanings.definition: The state of being inadequately staffed.
meanings.sent1: The understaffings in the store resulted in shelves not being restocked.
meanings.sent2: The school's understaffings led to overworked teachers and unhappy students.
meanings.sent3: The understaffings at the party made the host run around like crazy!
meanings.sent4: The understaffings in the police department left the city vulnerable to crime.
meanings.sent5: The understaffings during the event made organization nearly impossible.
